0: Modern UI for Ansible, Terraform/OpenTofu, Bash and Pulumi

---
directory: /media/music
library: /data/library.db
import:
  move: true
  from_scratch: true
asciify_paths: true
group_albums: true
per_disc_numbering: true
paths:
  default: "$albumartist/[%if{$year,$year,0000}] $album%aunique{}/%if{$multidisc,$disc-}$track - $title"
  albumtype:soundtrack: "000-soundtracks/$album [%if{$year,$year,0000}]%aunique{}/%if{$multidisc,$disc-}$track - $title"
  comp: "000-compilations/$album [%if{$year,$year,0000}]%aunique{}/%if{$multidisc,$disc-}$track - %if{$artist,$artist - }$title"
  singleton: "000-non-album/$artist/$title"
plugins:
  - albumtypes # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/albumtypes.html
  - discogs # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/discogs.html
  - duplicates # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en//stable/plugins/duplicates.html
  - extrafiles # https://github.com/Holzhaus/beets-extrafiles
  - fetchart # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/fetchart.html
  - ftintitle # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/ftintitle.html
  - inline # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/inline.html
  - lastgenre # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/lastgenre.html
  - lyrics # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/lyrics.html
  - missing # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/missing.html
  - mbsync # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/mbsync.html
  - scrub # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/scrub.html
  - web # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/web.html
discogs:
  source_weight: 0.0
extrafiles:
  patterns:
      all:
        - '*.*'
fetchart:
  cautious: true
  sources: itunes *
item_fields:
  multidisc: 1 if disctotal > 1 else 0
lastgenre:
  canonical: yes
lyrics:
  fallback: ''
  synced: true
fuzzy:
web:
  reverse_proxy: true
  host: 0.0.0.0

/hr/stevehipwell.github.io-helm-charts-t.title: thanos helm release
/hr/stevehipwell.github.io-helm-charts-t.name: thanos

0:
groups:
  - name: PrometheusWatcher
    rules:
      - alert: PrometheusDown
        annotations:
          summary: A Prometheus has disappeared from Prometheus target discovery
        expr: absent(up{job="kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus"})
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: critical
1:
groups:
  - name: PrometheusWatcher
    rules:
      - alert: PrometheusDown
        annotations:
          summary: A Prometheus has disappeared from Prometheus target discovery
        expr: absent(up{job="kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus"})
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: critical

/hr/stevehipwell.github.io-helm-charts-t.doc: Thanos is an open-source project that provides a highly available and horizontally scalable way to store and query time-series data in a Kubernetes cluster. It integrates with popular time-series databases, such as Prometheus, to provide a unified view of your monitoring and logging data. Thanos also provides features such as data compression and deduplication, making it an efficient solution for storing large amounts of time-series data. With Thanos, you can easily store, query, and analyze your home lab's monitoring and logging data, providing valuable insights into the performance and health of your applications.

1:
provider = "google"
auth_logging = true
cookie_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
cookie_httponly = true
cookie_name = "_john_family_oauth"
cookie_refresh = "1h"
cookie_samesite = "lax"
cookie_secure = true
email_domains = [ "${FAMILY_DOMAIN}" ]
pass_access_token = true
pass_authorization_header = true
pass_basic_auth = false
request_logging = true
session_store_type = "cookie"
silence_ping_logging = true
set_authorization_header = true
set_xauthrequest = true
skip_jwt_bearer_tokens = true
skip_provider_button = true
ssl_insecure_skip_verify = false
standard_logging = true
upstreams = [ "static://200" ]
whitelist_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
footer = "For Internal Family Use Only"
reverse_proxy = "true"
redirect_url = "https://sso.${FAMILY_DOMAIN}/oauth2/callback"
